name: Savings | Goal Setting & Balance Sheet
description: Take control of your finances for the price of a coffee. ☕️Track your cash flow against your savings goals with this simple income & expense Notion template.Simply, input your income, expenses, and savings goals and let the template summarize everything for you! Manage all your wallets & monthly transactions.Want more than just your finances in order? Check out my template for balancing all your life areas!
